text: from a distance the California to Hawaii
flight appears to be rather routine but
the plane is running out of fuel
suddenly the engine stops in a split
second a life-saving decision the pilot
ejects the parachute and then what's
possibly a pilot's worst nightmare
the aircraft nose dives plummeting
towards the sea the plane eventually
levels and is carried towards the water
before belly-flopping
more than 400 kilometers from his
destination the pilot Lou Morton pulls
out a life raft and abandons the plane
floating until he's picked up by the
crew from a nearby cruise ship the
incident is now under investigation have
you handled other emergencies like this
before no we need to get in funny voice
I gotta get going to there hopefully a
safer flight back home after a truly
remarkable close call
Aron soma BBC news
